channel.title: PICKUP HELP! please respond :D
channel.description:
hiya, its me, katie x and i have just made my new server and i have realised that when i do ::pickup 0995 100000000 for example, then it says c'mon, type IT AGAIN!, I personally have no problem with this, I cang o into character files and just place it in my inventory quite easily, but all the staff on my server complain about it and how annoying it is to them and it turns out I need to spawn it on there account manually by adding the item(s) into there character acount. :confused: :|
So could somebody please tell me how to fix this. I think it might have something to do with client.java but i know next to nothing about it to be honest.
Thanks everybody. Katie x. ;D ;D

item.title: PICKUP HELP! please respond :D
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

No prob, and it’s affected. Please try to use 5th grade words, it makes you look like your atleast 10.

Read full topic

item.title: PICKUP HELP! please respond :D
item.dc:creator: @dillsta2 dillsta2
item.description:
@dillsta2 wrote:

Thankyou very very much everybody. Sk1ttl3sc4p3 source is what I am using. I am not effected that I am not a master coder. I am a female indeed hense the name katie, for the record

Thankyou all. Topic closed.
